problem_names:
lemma monotonicity:
  assumes "(a, b) \<in> R\<^sup>*"
  shows "(a\<^sup>\<bullet>, b\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sup>*"

lemma semi_confluence:
  shows "(R\<inverse> O R\<^sup>*) \<subseteq> R\<^sup>\<down>"
translations:
lemma monotonicity:
  assumes "(a, b) \<in> R\<^sup>*"
  shows "(a\<^sup>\<bullet>, b\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sup>*"

proof (prove)
using this:
  (a, b) \<in> R\<^sup>*

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (a\<^sup>\<bullet>, b\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sup>*

lemma semi_confluence:
  shows "(R\<inverse> O R\<^sup>*) \<subseteq> R\<^sup>\<down>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. R\<inverse> O R\<^sup>* \<subseteq> R\<^sup>\<down>
proof (intro subrelI, elim relcompEpair, drule converseD)

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y b.
       \<lbrakk>(b, y) \<in> R\<^sup>*; (b, x) \<in> R\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (x, y) \<in> R\<^sup>\<down>

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y b.
       \<lbrakk>(b, y) \<in> R\<^sup>*; (b, x) \<in> R\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (x, y) \<in> R\<^sup>\<down>
assume "(a, c) \<in> R\<^sup>*" and "(a, d) \<in> R"

proof (state)
this:
  (a, c) \<in> R\<^sup>*
  (a, d) \<in> R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y b.
       \<lbrakk>(b, y) \<in> R\<^sup>*; (b, x) \<in> R\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (x, y) \<in> R\<^sup>\<down>

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (a, c) \<in> R\<^sup>*
  (a, d) \<in> R

proof (prove)
using this:
  (a, c) \<in> R\<^sup>*
  (a, d) \<in> R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (d, c) \<in> R\<^sup>\<down>

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<lbrakk>(a, d) \<in> R; a = c\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> (d, c) \<in> R\<^sup>\<down>
 2. \<And>y.
       \<lbrakk>(a, d) \<in> R; (a, y) \<in> R\<^sup>*;
        (y, c) \<in> R\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (d, c) \<in> R\<^sup>\<down>

proof (state)
this:
  (a, b) \<in> R\<^sup>*
  (b, c) \<in> R

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<lbrakk>(a, d) \<in> R; a = c\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> (d, c) \<in> R\<^sup>\<down>
 2. \<And>y.
       \<lbrakk>(a, d) \<in> R; (a, y) \<in> R\<^sup>*;
        (y, c) \<in> R\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (d, c) \<in> R\<^sup>\<down>

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (a, b) \<in> R\<^sup>*
  (b, c) \<in> R

proof (prove)
using this:
  (a, b) \<in> R\<^sup>*
  (b, c) \<in> R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (a\<^sup>\<bullet>, b\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sup>*

proof (state)
this:
  (a\<^sup>\<bullet>, b\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sup>*

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<lbrakk>(a, d) \<in> R; a = c\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> (d, c) \<in> R\<^sup>\<down>
 2. \<And>y.
       \<lbrakk>(a, d) \<in> R; (a, y) \<in> R\<^sup>*;
        (y, c) \<in> R\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (d, c) \<in> R\<^sup>\<down>

using this:

goal (1 subgoal):

using this:

using this:

goal:
No subgoals!
definition "R\<^sub>d = {(a, b). (a, b) \<in> R\<^sup>* \<and> (b, a\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sup>*}"

locale angle_property =
  fixes bullet :: "'a \<Rightarrow> 'a" ("_\<^sup>\<bullet>" [1000] 1000)
  and R :: "'a rel"
  and R\<^sub>d :: "'a rel"
  assumes intermediate: "R \<subseteq> R\<^sub>d" "R\<^sub>d \<subseteq> R\<^sup>*"
  and angle: "(a, b) \<in> R\<^sub>d \<Longrightarrow> (b, a\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sub>d"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. z_property bullet R

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a b.
       (a, b) \<in> R \<Longrightarrow>
       (b, a\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sup>* \<and>
       (a\<^sup>\<bullet>, b\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sup>*

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a b.
       (a, b) \<in> R \<Longrightarrow>
       (b, a\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sup>* \<and>
       (a\<^sup>\<bullet>, b\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sup>*

proof (state)
this:
  (a, b) \<in> R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a b.
       (a, b) \<in> R \<Longrightarrow>
       (b, a\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sup>* \<and>
       (a\<^sup>\<bullet>, b\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sup>*

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (?a, ?b) \<in> R\<^sub>d \<Longrightarrow>
  (?b, ?a\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sub>d
  R \<subseteq> R\<^sub>d
  R\<^sub>d \<subseteq> R\<^sup>*
  (a, b) \<in> R
have "(b, a\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sub>d" and "(a\<^sup>\<bullet>, b\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sub>d"

proof (prove)
using this:
  (?a, ?b) \<in> R\<^sub>d \<Longrightarrow>
  (?b, ?a\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sub>d
  R \<subseteq> R\<^sub>d
  R\<^sub>d \<subseteq> R\<^sup>*
  (a, b) \<in> R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (b, a\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sub>d &&&
    (a\<^sup>\<bullet>, b\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sub>d

proof (state)
this:
  (b, a\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sub>d
  (a\<^sup>\<bullet>, b\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sub>d

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a b.
       (a, b) \<in> R \<Longrightarrow>
       (b, a\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sup>* \<and>
       (a\<^sup>\<bullet>, b\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sup>*

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (b, a\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sub>d
  (a\<^sup>\<bullet>, b\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sub>d

proof (prove)
using this:
  (b, a\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sub>d
  (a\<^sup>\<bullet>, b\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sub>d

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (b, a\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sup>* \<and>
    (a\<^sup>\<bullet>, b\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sup>*

proof (prove)
using this:
  (b, a\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sub>d
  (a\<^sup>\<bullet>, b\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sub>d
  R \<subseteq> R\<^sub>d
  R\<^sub>d \<subseteq> R\<^sup>*

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (b, a\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sup>* \<and>
    (a\<^sup>\<bullet>, b\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sup>*

proof (state)
this:
  (b, a\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sup>* \<and>
  (a\<^sup>\<bullet>, b\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sup>*

goal:
No subgoals!
sublocale z_property \<subseteq> angle_property bullet R "z_property.R\<^sub>d bullet R"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. angle_property bullet R R\<^sub>d

proof (state)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. R \<subseteq> R\<^sub>d
 2. R\<^sub>d \<subseteq> R\<^sup>*
 3. \<And>a b.
       (a, b) \<in> R\<^sub>d \<Longrightarrow>
       (b, a\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sub>d

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. R \<subseteq> R\<^sub>d &&& R\<^sub>d \<subseteq> R\<^sup>*

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. R \<subseteq> {(a, b).
                   (a, b) \<in> R\<^sup>* \<and>
                   (b, a\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sup>*} &&&
    {(a, b).
     (a, b) \<in> R\<^sup>* \<and> (b, a\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sup>*}
    \<subseteq> R\<^sup>*

proof (prove)
using this:
  (?a, ?b) \<in> R \<Longrightarrow>
  (?b, ?a\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sup>* \<and>
  (?a\<^sup>\<bullet>, ?b\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sup>*

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. R \<subseteq> {(a, b).
                   (a, b) \<in> R\<^sup>* \<and>
                   (b, a\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sup>*} &&&
    {(a, b).
     (a, b) \<in> R\<^sup>* \<and> (b, a\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sup>*}
    \<subseteq> R\<^sup>*

proof (state)
this:
  R \<subseteq> R\<^sub>d
  R\<^sub>d \<subseteq> R\<^sup>*

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a b.
       (a, b) \<in> R\<^sub>d \<Longrightarrow>
       (b, a\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sub>d

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a b.
       (a, b) \<in> R\<^sub>d \<Longrightarrow>
       (b, a\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sub>d

proof (state)
this:
  (a, b) \<in> R\<^sub>d

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a b.
       (a, b) \<in> R\<^sub>d \<Longrightarrow>
       (b, a\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sub>d

proof (prove)
using this:
  (a, b) \<in> R\<^sub>d

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (b, a\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sub>d

proof (prove)
using this:
  (a, b) \<in> R\<^sub>d
  (?a, ?b) \<in> R\<^sup>* \<Longrightarrow>
  (?a\<^sup>\<bullet>, ?b\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sup>*

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (b, a\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sub>d

proof (prove)
using this:
  (a, b)
  \<in> {(a, b).
         (a, b) \<in> R\<^sup>* \<and>
         (b, a\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sup>*}
  (?a, ?b) \<in> R\<^sup>* \<Longrightarrow>
  (?a\<^sup>\<bullet>, ?b\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sup>*

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (b, a\<^sup>\<bullet>)
    \<in> {(a, b).
           (a, b) \<in> R\<^sup>* \<and>
           (b, a\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sup>*}

proof (state)
this:
  (b, a\<^sup>\<bullet>) \<in> R\<^sub>d

goal:
No subgoals!
